questions.question: Explore how GMV contributions from different acquisition channels are distributed across all business categories, then identify any unexpected patterns.

answer.value: Brand Ads has a disproportionate focus on Electronics & Appliances, and Beauty & Skincare shows a strong dependency on Live Streaming.

key_insights: Brand Ads sends the largest share of its GMV to Electronics & Appliances
Fresh Food is the highest-GMV category, supported by multiple channels, while Beauty & Skincare relies heavily on Live Streaming.

reasoning.reasoning: The first step of channel-by-channel filtering uncovers hidden dependencies
Reordering categories then shows which business lines are most significant overall and which rely on a single channel.
